name: A Horde Of Monsters
description:
This one-page print & play system-neutral TTRPG OSR sandbox by Horos sheds some light on Nimir's ancient origins and sinister future. Four old school, all hand-drawn black and white illustrations by Gustav Sokol, are featured:

• A local hexcrawl map for you to explore the northern Nimirian frontiers.

• A detailed dungeoncrawl map for you to delve deep into Zirzan's Temple.

• Stone Bridge top view.

• Stone Bridge side view.

For use with your favorite TTRPG OSR ruleset.
